Technical analysis is a school of market behavior analysis that mostly uses price charts and its purpose is to project future price movements. The proponents of technical analysis use data on price volume and the number of open positions in the case of futures markets.Technical analysis is based on 3 assumptions: 1-the market discounts everything2-prices follow trends3-history likes to repeat itself.
